entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING ENDED, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 3:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Wind: SE 64 km/h gust 80 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
